text: Sunnyslope is an unincorporated community in Canyon County in the southwestern part of the U.S. state of Idaho. The community is known as a center of the Snake River Valley AVA with 14 area wineries making up the Sunnyslope Wine Trail. Idaho State Highway 55 runs through the community. ==References== ==External links== *Sunnyslope Wine Trail Category:Unincorporated communities in Canyon County, Idaho Category:Unincorporated communities in Idaho Category:Boise metropolitan area
title: Sunnyslope, Idaho
